title: SpeciedexExplorer
blurb: Block explorer for the SpeciedexCore chain: browse species assets, lineage graphs, transactions, addresses, and verifiable proof artifacts.
description: SpeciedexExplorer is a web UI + API platform for inspecting the SpeciedexCore blockchain. It supports fast search across species/asset IDs, txids, and addresses; lineage graph visualization with confidence metrics; and exportable, hash-verifiable manifests for audits.

versions.notes: Address pages, lineage graph filters, exportable audit artifacts.
Asset search + tx/asset drilldown; basic API v1.
Initial UI shell with core RPC integration.
